q: Philadelphia has alternated wins and losses in its last six games after losing nine of 10. The Sixers, who opened the season 10-0 at the First Union Center, are 1-7 in their last eight home games. This is not the team we thought we were going to have, Sixers coach Larry Brown said, referring to injuries that have hampered the team. Philadelphia, which trailed by 18 in the second quarter, closed to 50-47 following a three-point play by Allen Iverson early in the third.
